title: Smart Data Models - SubGeographicalRegion
description: Adapted from CIM data models. A subset of a geographical region of a power system network model.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be SubGeographicalRegion

Lines.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The lines within the sub-geographical region. Default: 'list'

Region.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The geographical region to which this sub-geographical region is within. Default: None

Substations.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The substations in this sub-geographical region. Default: 'list'
